thread.title: Customer Larry Miller
thread.title_full: Uncle Dan's reviewed by Customer Larry Miller

author: Customer Larry Miller
title: Customer Larry Miller
text: I ordered some rain gear (Red Ledge) that I could not find anywhere else. In fact I had previously ordered the rain pants from another supplier who did not have the rain jacket. Not only did Uncle Dan's have the jacket, I received it before the pants that I had ordered before the jacket. Great service!! And fast!!
